recipe.title: Strawberries And Cream
recipe.ingredients: 1 8 oz cream cheese -- softened 1/3 cup sugar 1/2 tsp almond extract 1 cup whipped cream 4 cups strawberries 1/2 cup chocolate chips -- semi-sweet 1 tablespoon shortening 10 pastry shells
recipe.steps: In large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually add sugar and almond extract; blend well. Fold in whipped cream. Spoon into cooled, baked pie shell (or individual shells). Arrange strawberries, points up, over filling. Refrigerate. In small saucepan over low heat, melt chips and shortening, stirring constantly until smooth. D rizzle over strawberries and filling. Refrigerate until set.
